Description: Gold finger-ring; broad hoop; large circular bezel with engraved design: statue of Aphrodite Anadyomene on a base within a dotted shrine; on one side is a portable altar, on the other a figure of Eros; beyond, a male and a female worshipper.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (117)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
